ygData.subject: AGH! I hate what browsers do with 401!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Why can t we have an authentication scheme that doesn t cause cruddy user interface? Are there any people from browser development teams here? If so can you

Why can't we have an authentication scheme that doesn't cause cruddy
user interface?

Are there any people from browser development teams here?

If so can you explain why you can't support a non-UI authentication
scheme?
